channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【Announcing TypeScript 5.7 RC】宣布推出 TypeScript 5.7 RC
item.description: 【Today we are announcing the availability of the release candidate of TypeScript 5.7. To get started using the RC, you can get it through npm with the following command: npm install -D typescript@rc Let’s take a look at what’s new in TypeScript 5.7! Checks for Never-Initialized Variables For a long time, TypeScript has been able […]】今天，我们宣布推出 TypeScript 5.7 候选版本。要开始使用 RC，您可以使用以下命令通过 npm 获取它： npm install -D typescript@rc 让我们看看 TypeScript 5.7 中的新增功能！检查从未初始化的变量很长一段时间以来，TypeScript 一直能够 [...]

item.title: 【Why do I observe reads from a memory-mapped file when writing large blocks?】为什么在写入大块时会观察到内存映射文件的读取？
item.description: 【The CPU doesn't see the entire write at once.】CPU 不会立即看到整个写入。

item.title: 【The case of a program that crashed on its first instruction】程序在执行第一条指令时崩溃的情况
item.description: 【Didn't even make it out of the gate.】连门都没出。

item.title: 【Get Ready for .NET Conf 2024!】为 .NET Conf 2024 做好准备！
item.description: 【The biggest .NET event of the year is almost here, its all free, all online, and you're invited!】年度最大的 .NET 活动即将到来，全部免费，全部在线，诚邀您！

item.title: 【Three Ways to Simplify CI/CD Pipelines on GitHub Actions】GitHub Actions 上简化 CI/CD 管道的三种方法
item.description: 【This post focuses on three ways to simplify CI/CD pipelines deploying to Azure with GitHub Actions.】本文重点介绍使用 GitHub Actions 简化部署到 Azure 的 CI/CD 管道的三种方法。

item.title: 【Dev Blogs home page layout simplified】开发博客主页布局简化
item.description: 【Hello, Dev Blogs community! What we heard – part 2 In my previous post about the grid and list layout choices I shared the feedback we received after launching a Dev Blogs refresh. I also shared how we improved and provided options for the layout of posts. Today, I will address the other major feedback […]】您好，开发博客社区！我们听到了什么 - 第 2 部分 在我之前关于网格和列表布局选择的文章中，我分享了我们在启动开发博客刷新后收到的反馈。我还分享了我们如何改进并提供帖子布局的选项。今天，我将解决其他主要反馈[...]

item.title: 【Debugging a managed identity connection to Azure SQL in Azure App Service using containers】使用容器在 Azure 应用服务中调试与 Azure SQL 的托管标识连接
item.description: 【Dominique St-Amand explores how to debug a managed identity connection from a container-based App Service to Azure SQL. So you’ve been eager to deploy your containerized web application that you’ve been working on for a while, to Azure App Service. You follow the best security practices which means you’ve setup your connection to your Azure […]】Dominique St-Amand 探索如何调试从基于容器的应用服务到 Azure SQL 的托管标识连接。因此，您一直渴望将您已经开发了一段时间的容器化 Web 应用程序部署到 Azure 应用服务。您遵循最佳安全实践，这意味着您已经设置了与 Azure 的连接 [...]

item.title: 【Which compilation target should I pick for my Arm64 music apps, ASIO components, and plugins?】我应该为我的 Arm64 音乐应用程序、ASIO 组件和插件选择哪个编译目标？
item.description: 【The Windows music creation community today is centered around Intel/AMD x64 (x86-64) because that is what most Windows PCs run for some time now. The introduction of Arm64 Copilot+ PCs has provided new opportunities with efficient and powerful devices with great battery life and NPUs. But because we continue to support both the AMD/Intel x86-64 […]】今天的 Windows 音乐创作社区以 Intel/AMD x64 (x86-64) 为中心，因为这是大多数 Windows PC 现在运行的一段时间。 Arm64 Copilot+ PC 的推出为高效、强大的设备、超长的电池寿命和 NPU 提供了新的机遇。但因为我们继续支持 AMD/Intel x86-64 [...]

item.title: 【AI: The New Frontier for Developers】人工智能：开发人员的新领域
item.description: 【AJ Enns reflects on his journey as a new developer and the impact of AI as an integrated, coding assistant for improving developer velocity. The year is 2024, and AI has been around for a while. ChatGPT broke onto the scene and changed the world forever. As soon as I heard about it, the first […]】AJ Enns 回顾了他作为新开发人员的旅程，以及人工智能作为集成编码助手对提高开发人员速度的影响。今年是 2024 年，人工智能已经出现了一段时间。 ChatGPT 突然出现并永远改变了世界。我一听说这件事，第一个[…]

item.title: 【Go 1.23.3-1 and 1.22.9-1 Microsoft builds now available】Go 1.23.3-1 和 1.22.9-1 Microsoft 版本现已推出
item.description: 【A new set of Microsoft Go builds is now available for download.】一组新的 Microsoft Go 版本现已可供下载。
